scenes.caption: a man standing in front of a drum set
scenes.recaption: a young man with short brown hair and glasses stands on a stage in front of a large red TEDx logo. he is wearing a gray t-shirt and jeans. there is a drum set behind him.

scenes.caption: a man standing in front of a drum set
scenes.recaption: a young man with glasses stands on a stage in front of a large red TED logo. he is wearing a black t-shirt and jeans. he is speaking into a microphone. there is a drum set behind him.

scenes.caption: two men standing next to a jeep on a dirt road
scenes.recaption: two men standing next to a black suburban on a rocky dirt road. the men are wearing casual clothes and the suburban has a brush guard and roof rack. in the background, there are large rocks and trees.

scenes.caption: two men standing next to a truck on a dirt road
scenes.recaption: two men standing next to a black suburban on a rocky road. the men are wearing casual clothes and the suburban has a lot of off-road accessories on it. in the background, there are trees and mountains.

scenes.caption: a television screen showing a soccer game
scenes.recaption: A television screen shows a soccer game. There are several players on the field, and the ball is in the air. The players are wearing green and white uniforms. The stadium is full of people, and they are all cheering for their team.
